data.name: World of Busking
data.detailed_description:
World of Busking is an independently developed, MMO Social Game. Meet other players, interact with AI characters, play music, form bands, attend concerts and try to release your singles to become the #1 songwriter in Music City.

Features:
  • Street Busking - Take your music to the streets, woo the characters passing by and earn credits.
  • Bands - Group up with others to form bands and take on the world together.
  • Socializing - Earn Social Points by interacting with others, from going to their concerts, to cheering on them in the street.
  • Customization - Buy new instruments, music equipment, outfits, and ways to personalize your profile.
  • Management - Set up your business strategy, publish marketing campaigns and work with AI partners to get your songs on the charts.

Alpha Access:
You can now sign-up for the Alpha test!
Priority is given to players who sign-up via this store page and then visit our Discord server.

  • Apply for the playtest at the top of the page to see this game early and unlock limited cosmetics!
  • Once you apply, reach out to us on Discord by visiting our "Official Discord server" mentioned on the right - World of Busking is all about your feedback and becoming a part of the community.

About the Dev:
I have been developing this game as a passion project. Having always loved the social aspects of online games, World of Busking aims to be a fun, social space for people to make friends. I am keen to share the development process with others, with the World of Busking community directly suggesting where to take the project next.

data.short_description: World of Busking is an independently developed, MMO Social Game. Meet other players, interact with AI characters, play music, form bands, attend concerts and try to release your singles to become the #1 songwriter in Music City.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows: 7 SP1+, 8, 10, 11
  • Processor: Dual Core, SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities.
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires an internet connection to play.
